channel.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Container on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Layout_Container on SoftLayer API

item.title: getAllObjects
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Container::getAllObjects Overview Use this method to retrieve all active layout containers that can be customized. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerObjectFilter Return Values SoftLayer_Layout_Container[]

item.title: getLayoutContainerType
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Container::getLayoutContainerType Overview Retrieve the type of the layout container object Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerObjectMask SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Layout_Container_Type

item.title: getLayoutItems
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Container::getLayoutItems Overview Retrieve the layout items assigned to this layout container Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerObjectMask SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Layout_Item[]

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Container::getObject Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerObjectMask SoftLayer_Layout_ContainerObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Layout_Container
